prompt: Split screen visualization. Left side: A macro photo of a pencil mark on paper texture. Right side: The same image transforming into a grid of glowing green digital numbers (0-255) matrix. A magnifying glass effect showing the transition from analog ink to digital data. The Matrix code style, isometric view, scientific illustration, high contrast.
